nodes.text: Vixian Mauler was a non-sentient species native to the shadow world of Umbara. Immense predators standing several meters tall, Vixian Maulers had two large arms and a pair of legs strong enough to carry their big bodies. They had two glowing tendrils on top of their heads. The Commander and Lana Beniko killed one Vixian Mauler during the events of the Crisis on Umbara.
